shared.models

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.models.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Stephen Snyder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) Bank bank
      The bank contains all resource cards that do not belong to a player.
      (package private) CardDeck cardDeck
      The cardDeck contains all the development cards not belonging to a player.
      (package private) GameChat chat
      The game chat object stores and retrieves the history of the chat log between players.
      (package private) Dice dice
      This allows two random numbers between 1 and 6 to be generated at any time.
      (package private) GameLog log
      Stores the log for the game
      (package private) Map map
      The map contains all information having to do with the board.
      (package private) GamePlayers players
      The game players object holds four player objects that represent four clients that will connect to the server.
      (package private) TradeManager tradeManager
      The trade manager handles all trades between players.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      The Game class is a master class that contains all information having to do with a specific game of settlers of catan.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildCity(int playerID)
      Trades a player's resources for a new city on the map.
      void buildRoad(int playerID)
      Trades a player's resources for a new road on the map.
      void buildSettlement(int playerID)
      Trades a player's resources for a new settlement on the map.
      void buyDevelopmentCard(int playerID)
      Trades a player's resources for a development card
      void importGame()
      Takes in a json summary of a game and changes itself to match the specified game
      void offerATrade(int playerID)
      Allows a player to offer an exchange of resources to one or more other players
      void playMonopolyCard(int playerID)
      Allows a player to take all owned cards of a specified resource in exchange for a Monopoly Card
      void playRoadBuilderCard(int playerID)
      Allows a player to build two roads in exchange for a Road Builder Card
      void playSoldierCard(int playerID)
      Allows a player to move the robber in exchange for a Soldier Card
      void playYearOfPlentyCard(int playerID)
      Allows a player to choose two resources to be added to it's hand in exchange for a Year Of Plenty Card
      int rollDice(int playerID)
      If the specified player can roll the dice, do so

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • dice

        Dice dice
        This allows two random numbers between 1 and 6 to be generated at any time.

      • map

        Map map
        The map contains all information having to do with the board.

      • bank

        Bank bank
        The bank contains all resource cards that do not belong to a player.

      • cardDeck

        CardDeck cardDeck
        The cardDeck contains all the development cards not belonging to a player.

      • players

        GamePlayers players
        The game players object holds four player objects that represent four clients that will connect to the server.

      • log

        GameLog log
        Stores the log for the game

      • chat

        GameChat chat
        The game chat object stores and retrieves the history of the chat log between players.

      • tradeManager

        TradeManager tradeManager
        The trade manager handles all trades between players. Both storing and executing

    • Method Detail

      • importGame

        public void importGame()
        Takes in a json summary of a game and changes itself to match the specified game

      • rollDice

        public int rollDice(int playerID)
        If the specified player can roll the dice, do so

      • buildRoad

        public void buildRoad(int playerID)
        Trades a player's resources for a new road on the map. It must connect with another of the player's roads, settlements, or cities.

      • buildSettlement

        public void buildSettlement(int playerID)
        Trades a player's resources for a new settlement on the map. The player must have a road leading to the spot wanted. The selected place to build must also be at least two building spots away from any other settlement.

      • buildCity

        public void buildCity(int playerID)
        Trades a player's resources for a new city on the map. The player must build it in place of an existing settlement.

      • buyDevelopmentCard

        public void buyDevelopmentCard(int playerID)
        Trades a player's resources for a development card

      • playSoldierCard

        public void playSoldierCard(int playerID)
        Allows a player to move the robber in exchange for a Soldier Card

      • playRoadBuilderCard

        public void playRoadBuilderCard(int playerID)
        Allows a player to build two roads in exchange for a Road Builder Card

      • playMonopolyCard

        public void playMonopolyCard(int playerID)
        Allows a player to take all owned cards of a specified resource in exchange for a Monopoly Card

      • playYearOfPlentyCard

        public void playYearOfPlentyCard(int playerID)
        Allows a player to choose two resources to be added to it's hand in exchange for a Year Of Plenty Card

      • offerATrade

        public void offerATrade(int playerID)
        Allows a player to offer an exchange of resources to one or more other players
